posts.post_content:
I am just taking a chance here that a member purchased a lot of 3 cabinet photos of Harvard players from the REA  2016 auction.  One of the players was identified as Ernst.  If someone here has it and is willing to part with it I would be interested in buying it, or trading for it if they prefer.
I am also seeking Harvard related baseball items from 1865 to 1879, including letters, photos, and ephemera.  
Thank you
